title: Rajakumari Polki Haaram with Radiant Rubies
materials: Faceted Rubies. Hyderabadi Polish. String of Natural Pearls.
features: A captivating Polki Haaram featuring a graduated design with bezel-set polki diamonds interspersed with rows of vibrant, faceted rubies. The centerpiece is a magnificent polki diamond pendant encircled by smaller diamonds, creating a mesmerizing focal point. The necklace transitions to a string of lustrous natural pearls near the clasp for added elegance. Exemplifies the classic South Indian jewelry aesthetic with a modern twist.
occasions: and high-end social gatherings. A timeless piece to be treasured for generations.
description: This Rajakumari Haaram is a testament to the enduring legacy of South Indian craftsmanship. The use of uncut polki diamonds lends a regal and antique feel, while the vibrant rubies add a touch of modern glamour. Crafted with meticulous attention to detail and using only the finest materials, this necklace is a true heirloom piece. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, ensuring a radiant shine that will captivate all who see it. Its perfect blend of tradition and contemporary style makes it a versatile piece for any discerning jewelry collector.
